title: No guarantee that cash infusion results in consumption: Finance Secy - Business Today
content: No guarantee that cash infusion results in consumption: Finance Secy  Business Today
description: Balance sheets are in better shape, banks are in a better position to lend, the capital markets have funds to lend because of a lot of funds are coming in. We are likely to see a revival of private demand, said Finance Secretary, T. V. Somanathan in an exclusive interview with Business Today TV.
